abstract: "We want to take I.B.M. on in their strongest suit, microprocessors," says Larry Ellison, chief executive of Oracle.  A tight coupling of hardware and software will lead to better performance handling data, he says.
snippet: "We want to take I.B.M. on in their strongest suit, microprocessors," says Larry Ellison, chief executive of Oracle.  A tight coupling of hardware and software will lead to better performance handling data, he says.

headline.main: Larry Ellison Wants Data to Move Faster
